actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1422.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #669 (180-143).

official_title: A resolution authorizing participation by counsel on behalf of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations of the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce in any judicial proceeding concerning subpoenas.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1422) Authorizes the Chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations of the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to intervene and appear in =United States v. American Telephone and Telegraph Co.=, et al. in order to secure information relating to the privacy of telephone communications. Authorizes the Chairman to employ a special counsel to represent the Committee and the House with respect to such civil action.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing participation by counsel on behalf of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations of the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce in any judicial proceeding concerning subpoenas.
